document: @BroadwayGirlNYC I have downloaded and listened to so much Chet Baker since seeing @arielstachel in @TheBandsVisit. Thank you, @DavidYazbek. I ❤️ My Funny Valentine, and so much more!
@petermarksdrama @JesseKGreen Why not? 😂
@TheDrDrama @IainLoveTheatre @HelloDollyBway @SantinoFontana Of course, Gavin Creel is no slouch. 😍
@JudyKuhn1 Every nanosecond of every minute of every day.

@CormacLucey @Dermot8624 @HumanProgress Curious. Thinking of the very well-off, in what way are they less well-off than US counterparts? Fewer gold toilets, McMansions, private jets? Or something more substantive?
RT @will_doran: Voters in two of North Carolina’s biggest counties, Charlotte and Durham, turned against their elected Sheriffs last night…
@TheDrDrama @IainLoveTheatre @HelloDollyBway @SantinoFontana According to Seth Rudetsky, Gavin Creel is back.

@jonathankappler @will_doran In my former county (Warren), all 3 school board incumbents facing opposition lost, and they had been there for ages. Is it a matter of people finally stepping up to run, and voters looking for change? Hard to say yet, but interesting development.
@BreeNewsome Durham did well too.
@MarslandRoss @AndySpecht @DukeU @joevangogh @Yoh31 True.

RT @AndySpecht: The top story in NC right now:

-@DukeU VP complains to campus @joevangogh about playing rap song.
-Baristas apologize to h…
@tnclimate @ShaunKing @joevangogh @Dukestuaff My money would be on @Dukestuaff.
@RottenBroadway @RobMcClure @BlumenthalArts I loved you guys so much in Durham, I’m hopping a train 🚊 to Charlotte this week to see @RottenBroadway 🍅 for the fourth time! Can’t wait!
RT @HatchJai: VOICE SAVE #voicesaverayshun
#VoiceSaveRayshun
@Sarah_Willets @indyweek I didn’t see it, but I already planned on voting for his opponent. And did so.
@wecomefromaway The trees. I looked up close on my first visit to see those leaves. I realize they may no longer be there, but they’ll always be part of the set in my head.
@JosephAMorales @SamuelLJackson Omg, I flew home from Paris last week with that guy. Nine hours. Brutal.
@Lin_Manuel @Prizeo Donated! #TomorrrowThere’llBeMoreOfUs
@TheDrDrama @Lin_Manuel “You’ve got to be carefully taught!”
@TheHamilcast @DavidKorins Chicago, for sure!
@Brasilmagic I’d go anywhere @Lin_Manuel told me to go, and smile all the way.
@Rountowngirl1 @DavidCayJ You can get a dip for them that discourages rodents. Usually made of some combination of garlic oil and cayenne.
@TheDrDrama @etaibenson @TheBandsVisit @DavidYazbek He’s wonderful. The song is perfect.

@JCACharles @hypatiadotca Yet you recently retweeted this re an older woman... “Today I got super angry talking about the NY12 primary, where a young man has cruised into a district where he doesn’t live to challenge Carolyn Maloney, an older woman and steady liberal Democrat.”

Much ado about semantics?
Ha! Me too! https://t.co/m7y3oSWPyi
@RevEdBacon @TheBandsVisit @DavidYazbek I do! I have been since January. @TheBandsVisit and @wecomefromaway are heart-healing.

@olga_z_rivas @tomcolicchio Ha, I’m sure you never complained about President Obama. What have you accomplished in your life, btw? And more importantly, what have you done for others? Tom’s record of service is exemplary.

@peanutpollino I ❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️ understudies, standbys and swings. They are heroes! I kind of get a thrill checking my insert on favorite shows like @HamiltonMusical and seeing whose interpretation I will be gifted with.
@MohamedMOSalih Coke

@DavidYazbek Well, your fantastic Sunday night made my Sunday night joyful. Not to mention, picking my favorite show @TheBandsVisit to sweep helped me win all the swag from the local @TheTonyAwards party. Congratulations! Can’t wait to see it for fifth time.
@TheHamilcast Gillian, you really do have a wonderful life! 😉 https://t.co/RzfA0hD4Pm
@ilanalevine Love that band (and the show) so, so, soooooooooo much.

@TheRealJKirk This is making me cry happy tears. I’ve just watched yet another video of a racist woman cursing at a Vietnamese nail salon owner and I can hardly stand the world right now. This is incredible. Thank you for sharing it.

@WSPate @arielstachel Yes, me too! This was after a matinee on a cold January day, and I’m sure he had other places to be before having to return to the theatre. Very kind and humble. I look forward to seeing @TheBandsVisit again, next time I can get back to NYC from NC. https://t.co/dyXYzqY4OR
@planktonburrsir And Tootsie! (@SantinoFontana ! Music by @DavidYazbek )
@BillOReilly I haven't agreed much with the Times lately, but I'd be on board wholeheartedly with this.
@BroadwayHumans @TheBandsVisit Love it!

@TheBandsVisit I've leaned in four times, actually, physically, leaned in. Sometimes, when I listen to the cast album at home, I find I'm doing the same. In six decades of seeing musical theatre, I can't remember anything like this. Congratulations on all the wins. I love this show so much!
@dennisandsandy @Feisty_FL Nah, it won’t.
@Feisty_FL @jwhit22206 I’m, no they didn’t boo Mike Pence. The audience did and the Hamilton cast stopped it.
@jwhit22206 @LaraLeaTrump @StruxMel As a sign of a traitor, of course it should be in there.

@CarmiOnTheVerge @NicoleHertvik @Nat_Tuck @petermarksdrama I saw each twice. Tony was great no matter where I sat. Kashani was more subdued. Good enough if you sit in the orchestra; it didn’t read at all to me when I sat in the mezzanine.
Yes! https://t.co/4AkQ6RgxLv
@PattiMurin You are fantastic!
@AlanHenry So glad to have that recording for multiple future viewings.

@chrislhayes @BadHombreNPS I’m grateful they were not taken to showers, but wonder when that will start to occur to our nazi-in-chief. His supporters will be fine with a few brown kids being gassed. They’ve already cheered them being shot in the head at a border or being returned to Mexico to be killed.

@theatreguy22 @divarobbie I was surprised but pleased by the SpongeBob pick. The group watching with me loved that. Mama Will Provide conveyed the energy and spirit of OOTI. Omar Sharif is THE epitome of what TBV is about, but might not appeal to everyone. Sadly, the show won’t either. (I adore it!)
@TheBandsVisit Proud of everyone—with a P. Pleased as punch—with 2 more Ps. Ah, I’ve got it—Bravo! With a B!

@theatermania @TheKatrinaLenk @LindsayMendez @arielstachel @DavidYazbek @TheTonyAwards I love this photo. I’ve been fortunate to see @TheBandsVisit four times, and I’d happily go every day if I lived in New York. There is so much talent in that show!
@jamesmiglehart @TheTonyAwards So funny!

@jamesmiglehart @QueenLesli @PattiMurin @CaissieLevy True! Nor @QueenLesli! I really want to see you two in a show together at some point (though no stage would be big enough, plus I want you to be T.Jeff forever). Maybe it’s time for a female King George III.
@WSPate @TheBandsVisit I didn’t realize that. I’ve listened to it a few times. Looks like I need to become a regular listener.
@WSPate @TheBandsVisit He is, and so nice to fans! At first I wasn’t expecting it, but as the evening went on, I began to sense he was going to have his name called.

@WSPate @TheBandsVisit I saw Tony twice, then Dariush twice. Dariush is subtle. I found him hard to read from mezzanine, but wonderful when I was closer. But I still hear most of the show with Tony’s voice in my head. I’ll be going back too, but not until fall.
@WSPate @TheBandsVisit Did you see who is coming in to replace Tony Shalhoub? Sasson Gabai from the film.

@julie_james @TheTonyAwards @SpongeBobBway I heard it before going to a theatre Tony watch party tonight. After Gavin performed (fantastically!), another guest asked our host how the costume worked, and I passed along to her what I’d heard him say in your interview. There was a lot of curiosity about it!

@julie_james @MyFairLadyBway @SaraBareilles @joshgroban @TheTonyAwards They used my Peter Pan photo during the end credits tonight. 😊 Hope your Eliza made a showing too! Great job covering the awards tonight @julie_james!
@BroadwayGirlNYC When she is onstage, you cannot look away. Mesmerizing.
@JelaniAlladin @arielstachel I think I was screaming at the @DPAC watch party. This was such a thrill, and he is so deserving.
Hey! I was on @TheTonyAwards tonight! Thanks @BroadwayGirlNYC for encouraging us to post our #BroadwayDreams. #PeterPan #You CanFlyEvenAt44 https://t.co/YLNPAcsYwn

@TheHamilcast @fergsters95 @MPSmithnyc @GillianWithaG Fantastic! I just re-listened to his earlier episode with Julian Ramos yesterday as prep for Philip tour in Vegas in 13 days. Extra special because I’m taking my 14-year-old nephew to his first show ever. Surprise, Gordie!
@YesBway @TheTonyAwards No, it’s #1.
@WSPate @thekirbyt @arielstachel @TheBandsVisit And @TheKatrinaLenk and @DavidYazbek
@ezlusztig @StevePasquale Yes, unfortunately. This is US.
@WSPate Agreed.
@BroadwayGirlNYC @TheTonyAwards These are great! So clever!
@helenel @WestWingWeekly @HrishiHirway Season Five is largely excruciating. Not a lot of fun to be had anyway. So go ahead Hrishi.
RT @DanBlueNC: Read this and consider the implications of voter id,  intented or not #ncpol https://t.co/5T0grdetp0

@TheRealJKirk I can’t possibly “like” this tweet under these circumstances, but I can send ❤️. I can’t understand what this is like, but I can listen, learn, and speak against racism. So sorry this is America.
I was forty-four when I finally got to fly! Dreams can happen! @TheTonyAwards #TonyDreams https://t.co/gCVI7m8lCf
@sundayshowtunes @TheBandsVisit @TheTonyAwards One of my all time favorites. Already seen it four times, and I live 500 miles away.

@BroadwayGirlNYC @TheTonyAwards I’m going to a viewing party @DPAC with friends and will try to keep up on social media at the same time. Plus I’ll be jumping up and down and screaming every time @TheBandsVisit wins. I hope to be hoarse by the end of the evening. 🎺🎻💓 🇪🇬 🇮🇱 #ILikeChetBaker #TheFansVisit
@bwayconnected Always gets a laugh...
@bwayconnected I’m lucky to have seen both Papis - twice!
You could start with @jamesmiglehart episode. It saved me last summer through plane delays and lost luggage. I was so busy laughing, I didn’t care. #Megatevid #okay
@TheHamilcast I know of a good podcast you could listen to. It’s what I do. 😉
@julie_james @FrozenBroadway Very enjoyable program!
@playbill Seeing a children’s theatre production of The Wizard of Oz in Spartanburg, SC. I said, “I can do that.” I was in fourth grade, and this was well before A Chorus Line. ☺️
RT @TheBandsVisit: Discover how an ordinary moment of connection can transform into something achingly extraordinary. #TheBandsVisit (1/2)…
@bwayfrannie Not inappropriate.
@MohamedMOSalih Small city, with neighborhoods, community, but few traffic problems. I lived in the country or small towns for decades. Now I’m in a city, I’m so much happier.
@BroadwayGirlNYC Last Wednesday on my way to that Pink Show... https://t.co/g3A7wqwTJd
@SenatorBerger Eden gets a park because @SenatorBerger is buying votes. Needier towns are retaliated against. #ParkPork #corruption
@LorettaBoniti @SenatorBerger @SenBrentJackson @FloydMcKissick Nice pork you picked out for your hometown. I’d like my $10 back to support MY hometown. @SenatorBerger is corrupt.

RT @longlivekcx: watch this. And then watch it again. and spread it like wild fire. https://t.co/7TjAwixW21
@AeronJamesUK @TheBandsVisit Haled’s Song About Love is so gorgeous. Seriously, I am obsessed with the whole score. I never skip a track, and that’s unusual for me.
@theatreguy22 Anita Morris in Nine. I didn’t see the show but I’ve seen the costume on exhibit twice. It must have looked stunning onstage. I pretty much go gaga after anything from WIL though.
@Hawk__Screech @TheBandsVisit @arielstachel @TheKatrinaLenk @etaibenson Fantastic!
@BroadwayGirlNYC @arielstachel Wonderful article; an inspiring and honest story. More evidence, as if I didn’t already feel it, that @TheBandsVisit is essential.
@TheBandsVisit @davidmcromer @TheKatrinaLenk She has the rare quality of being unique. I can’t think of anyone like her. Impossible to look away when she is onstage. Simply mesmerizing!
@Ahmedabadblog1 @TheBandsVisit .@arielstachel ‘s backstory is one of the many reasons I love @TheBandsVisit and find it such a necessary piece of theatre. And yes, he’s definitely sexy!
@ilanalevine Theatre, gardens, cats, and chocolate.

@RussKaplanPlus @TheBandsVisit @TheGreenRoom42 You are welcome! Loved the show!
If I can’t see @TheBandsVisit on a Sunday night, I found the next best thing! @RussKaplanPlus @TheGreenRoom42 #OmarSharif https://t.co/1dZ1dHxfaQ

@Broadwaysted @GreyhoundBus @loveneverdies @wecomefromaway helps me be more tolerant of fellow travelers. I don’t get so irritated by little annoyances like kids kicking my💺
